summary.p: Came home yesterday; will send a report on the negotiations in Worms as soon as it is copied. Hopes for lasting connection.

div.p: Greetings. I came home yesterday. I would have liked to send the proceedings of Worms to you, but they could not be copied immediately. I will send them as soon as they have been copied. Meanwhile, I wanted to at least convey this.
I hope that all love and unity in the Lord remain intact among us. I wish to see you all well in the Lord. May the Lord Christ guide us in His truth. Amen.
Your brother in the Lord, Simon Grynäus.
To the ministers of the Holy Gospel in Zürich, dearest brothers in the Lord Christ.
